body_html:
@benedikt looks awesome!

I guess we could even remove the date from the individual activities and just keep the time there?

But, more importantly, there seems to be a brittle spec (or a missing order clause depending how you look at it ;) https://travis-ci.org/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/builds/9202402#L292 ... which, if i would merge the pull request now, would keep Travis from deploying it to production.

Any chance you could fix this?

body:
@benedikt looks awesome!

I guess we could even remove the date from the individual activities and just keep the time there?

But, more importantly, there seems to be a brittle spec (or a missing order clause depending how you look at it ;) https://travis-ci.org/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/builds/9202402#L292 ... which, if i would merge the pull request now, would keep Travis from deploying it to production.

Any chance you could fix this?
